Articles.Content:
*Freya shoots one dozens of times, it finally dies*

Freya: Well then. Crab for dinner, anyone?

Dariya: Ooooh, I know this great recipe!

*Nadari facepalms*

What's the recipe that works with extra-terrestrial crabs?

Also, they have guns?

Space crab! I see them opening a successful chain of seafood restaurants on Laythe.

Also The post count is OVER 1,000!

@Trekkette below V: She has issue with airport security often? xD

Edited June 7, 2013 by Rage097

What's the recipe that works with extra-terrestrial crabs?

Also, they have guns?

Please, it's FREYA. The woman's heavily armed at all times.

Space crab! I see them opening a successful chain of seafood restaurants on Laythe.

Also The post count is OVER 1,000!

don't attract the mods .

btw Has one of you ever tried the Kerbal Livefeed mod? chatting an playing KSP sounds very good to me.

On topic: Are there actual cites on Laythe?

don't attract the mods .

btw Has one of you ever tried the Kerbal Livefeed mod? chatting an playing KSP sounds very good to me.

On topic: Are there actual cites on Laythe?

As yet, it's uninhabited. This mission is assessing the viability of colonization.

Please, it's FREYA. The woman's heavily armed at all times.

I know but...I don't think them being trapped in a capsule for the time it would take to reach Laythe, would be a good idea if they have access to guns..

So Freya is the PfL version of Chobit then?

As yet, it's uninhabited. This mission is assessing the viability of colonization.

Giant Enemy Crabs that can take quite a beating may interfere with that.

Said Crabs also have a WEAK SPOT FOR MASSIVE DAMAGE.

All the Memes...

@Leon: there's an Idea, A story about the months they spent trapped in the command capsule.

I know but...I don't think them being trapped in a capsule for the time it would take to reach Laythe, would be a good idea if they have access to guns..

So Freya is the PfL version of Chobit then?

Of Chobit when it was assumed he was a girl, yes. Except... moreso.
Even best of friends could end up killing each other if they had access to guns if they were trapped in the capsule for months.
The first Fan-fic will be some hilarious thing about the escalations that happen within said capsule. I'm imagining a whole "Stay on you side of the line!" deal going on.

The first Fan-fic will be some hilarious thing about the escalations that happen within said capsule. I'm imagining a whole "Stay on you side of the line!" deal going on.
